typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Overall rank} as string,
		{Country or region} as string,
		Score as string,
		{GDP per capita} as string,
		{Social support} as string,
		{Healthy life expectancy} as string,
		{Freedom to make life choices} as string,
		Generosity as string,
		{Perceptions of corruption} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 aggregate({Country or region} = count()) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
